text: Kananjalo khonzani uAllâh ningayamanisi namnye kuYe. Baphathenikakuhleabazali,izihlobo,iinkedamanabasweleyo, ummelwane osondeleyo ngokuhlobana, ummelwane ongesosihlobo (sakho), umhlobo wakho osecaleni kwakho, umhambi (odibana naye) nabo basezandleni zenu zokunene. Inene uAllâh akabathandi abo banekratshi baqhayisayo
